spells.html_content:
Spells

Prey
/ Venison
1 - 6 Range / 1AP

Applies the Prey state on the targeted enemy.
Entities who attack the target are healed by some of the damage inflicted.

If the Prey dies, sets the spell's cooldown period to 0.

There can only be one Prey per team.
If the spell is cast on another enemy, its effects are removed from the previous target.
Required level: :
1|66|132

Normal effects

'Prey' state (infinite)
Heals the attacker by 15% of damage suffered

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Recast interval
2
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
No
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
Yes

details.name: Prey
details.description:
Applies the Prey state on the targeted enemy.
Entities who attack the target are healed by some of the damage inflicted.

If the Prey dies, sets the spell's cooldown period to 0.

There can only be one Prey per team.
If the spell is cast on another enemy, its effects are removed from the previous target.

effects.title: Heals the attacker by 15% of damage suffered

other.title: Cast in a straight line only

spells.html_content:
Spells

Yapper Launcher
/ Gangrene
1 - 3 Range / 3AP

Summons a biddable Yapper that steals HP in the Neutral element from enemies.
Its health steal is greater on summons.

Every time its summoner inflicts damage with their class spells, the Yapper is attracted towards the Prey and attacks if it's within range.
The damage is reduced by half outside its turn.
Required level: :
15|82|149

Normal effects

Summons Yapper

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Recast interval
4
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
No

details.name: Yapper Launcher
details.description:
Summons a biddable Yapper that steals HP in the Neutral element from enemies.
Its health steal is greater on summons.

Every time its summoner inflicts damage with their class spells, the Yapper is attracted towards the Prey and attacks if it's within range.
The damage is reduced by half outside its turn.

spells.html_content:
Spells

Call of the Pack
/ New Moon
5 Range / 2AP

Reduces the cooldown period of the Yapper Launcher spell for the caster.
• If the target is the caster: attracts all allies towards the target.
• If the target is the Prey: erodes the target and attracts all allies towards it.
The attraction is greater if the target is the Prey.

The effects cannot be unbewitched.
Required level: :
95|157

Normal effects

Yapper Launcher: -1 turns until recast
Attracts 2 cell(s)
10% Erosion (1 turn)
Attracts 4 cell(s)

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Recast interval
2
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
Yes
Area of Effect
Circle of 63 cells

spells.html_content:
Spells

Ferocity
/ Protective Pelt
3 Range / 2AP

Applies the Ferocity state on the targeted ally:
• Applies a shield if the targeted ally is attracted, pushed, transposed, teleported or suffers an attempted MP removal.

The state cannot be unbewitched.
Cannot be used in Animal Form.
Required level: :
155

Normal effects

'Ferocity' state (2 turns)
240% of level to shield (1 turn)

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Global recast interval
2
Recast interval
2
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
Yes
Target necessary
Yes

The state cannot be unbewitched. 
Cannot be used in Animal Form.

spells.html_content:
Spells

Pursuit
/ Panic
6 Range / 2AP

Places a glyph that increases allies' MP.

On the Prey: places the glyph and applies the Pursuit state on the target, which places the glyph under it again at the start of its turn.
This effect is only applied if the target is still the Prey, and the effect cannot be unbewitched.
Required level: :
180

Normal effects

Places a glyph-aura (1 turn)
'Pursuit' state (1 turn)

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Recast interval
2
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
Yes
Target necessary
Yes

details.name: Pursuit
details.description:
Places a glyph that increases allies' MP.

On the Prey: places the glyph and applies the Pursuit state on the target, which places the glyph under it again at the start of its turn.
This effect is only applied if the target is still the Prey, and the effect cannot be unbewitched.

/ Sniff
1 - 5 Range / 2AP

• Teleports the caster's Yappers to be adjacent to them.

Increases the caster's Rage (requires a target).
